title: Drawing, Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) Design for Decorated Paper: Blue and Aqua Plaid, early 20th century
title_raw: Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) Design for Decorated Paper: Blue and Aqua Plaid
medium: Brush and watercolor (gouache?) on off-white coated wove paper
markings: On verso, above inscription at lower right, Weiner Werkstatte stamp in purple (partly legible).
inscribed: On verso, inscribed in graphite, lower right: M1.50 / KW 1168; and lower left: 1166 [above] 1633(3)[with horizontal line between them]
description: Wiener Werksatte (Vienna Workshop) design for decorated paper: blue and aqua plaid pattern.  Looks like combed paper or finger-painted image.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) Design for Decorated Paper: Blue and Aqua Plaid, early 20th century. Brush and watercolor (gouache?) on off-white coated wove paper. 
Gift of Tamar Cohen. 1999-6-9
